billhistory.lastaction: 03/23/2015 H Referred to State Affairs: Mar 23 2015 5:33PM
billhistory.caption: Relating to the religious freedom of a conscientious objector to act or fail to act with respect to certain issues of marriage, sexual relations, and gender.
